casebody.data:
David WICHNOSKI, O.D., P.A., et al.
v.
PIEDMONT FIRE PROTECTION SYSTEMS, LLC, et al. 26PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2018 John W. Reis, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Main Street America Assurance Company. Jay M. Goldstein, Attorney at Law, Albert S. Nalibotsky, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for David Wichnoski, O.D., P.A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of March 2018 by Plaintiffs to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of March 2018."
